China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 2 月 16 日星期五 23:51:56 GMT 120
Eyeing China, senior US lawmaker vows to back funding for Pacific islandsThe Republican chairman of the U.S. House of Representatives Foreign Affairs Committee said on Friday he supported funding for U.S.-allied Pacific Island nations as a way to counter the influence of China, and would push to include them in any supplemental security aid bill. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 21:45:22 GMT LZC6UGA4OZJATBVUSNCCCWXHLI https://www.reuters.com/world/eyeing-china-senior-us-lawmaker-vows-back-funding-pacific-islands-2024-02-16/Reuters世界
Italy watchdog forces TikTok to remove 'French scar' challenge videosItaly's communications authority AGCOM on Friday said it had forced social media app TikTok to remove some videos showing young people performing a dangerous practice known as the "French scar". Fri, 16 Feb 2024 17:41:20 GMT X22CYOCKOVNI5JMAR2FSWPKVHA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/italy-watchdog-forces-remove-tiktok-french-scar-challenge-videos-2024-02-16/Reuters世界欧洲
Wars and elections complicate WTO deal-making ahead of Abu Dhabi meeting, says WTO chiefThe head of the World Trade Organization warned on Friday that it could be difficult to strike deals at a major ministerial meeting later this month given a spate of upcoming elections, recessions and wars in Ukraine and Gaza. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 15:06:57 GMT 5KWITMV4KVOZNNIOIEUFKJ2WQA https://www.reuters.com/markets/deals/wars-elections-complicated-deal-making-ahead-wto-chief-meeting-2024-02-16/Reuters市场交易
China boosts Volkswagen's January deliveries, up 13%Volkswagen on Friday said group deliveries rose 13.3% in January to 698,200 vehicles, with China the leading growth region. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 12:32:19 GMT ZJQZCUBFNVOJBI7WS46YPLKKKE https://www.reuters.com/business/auto-transportation/china-boosts-volkswagen-january-deliveries-up-13-2024-02-16/Reuters商业汽车与交通
Morning Bid: Global stocks at two-year highs, Nikkei skirts recordA look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan Fri, 16 Feb 2024 11:03:42 GMT SUA3ANLR2BI63POFTCENSJPM5Y https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-markets-view-usa-2024-02-16/Reuters市场
Taiwan agrees to bring in Indian migrant workers to ease job crunchTaiwan and India signed an agreement on Friday to bring in Indian migrant workers to the island as labour-strained Taipei seeks to expand its foreign workforce beyond its traditional source countries of Southeast Asia. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 10:32:12 GMT NWOWYCDPFOJRBFZESNHTVI2FM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-agree-to-bring-indian-migrant-workers-ease-job-crunch-2024-02-16/Reuters世界亚太地区
